meanings.definition: The act of devastating or the state of being devastated.
meanings.sent1: The devastations caused by the hurricane left the town in ruins.
meanings.sent2: The community came together to rebuild after the devastations of the storm.
meanings.sent3: Despite the devastations, the resilient town found hope in the midst of chaos.
meanings.sent4: The devastations of war echoed through the generations, leaving scars on the land.
meanings.sent5: The images of the devastations haunted the survivors for years to come.
